summaries.name: MCP Technical Core
summaries.summary: Deep technical expertise in Model Context Protocol (MCP) - spans protocol fundamentals (JSONRPC, stdio transport, 5 primitives: Resources/Prompts/Tools/Sampling/Roots) to production deployment (security, troubleshooting, KB integration). Primary knowledge domain with comprehensive coverage from low-level implementation to architectural decisions (ADR-0003/0004/0005/0006). Includes Obsidian dual-layer integration, embedding pipelines, agent SDK patterns, and operational guides.
summaries.interpretation: Primary expertise domain - actively maintained, mature understanding with high interconnection

summaries.name: Daily Practice & Reflection
summaries.summary: Meta-cognitive operating system for daily work organization. Structured reflection cycles: Plan ‚Üí Execute ‚Üí Reflect ‚Üí Extract Learnings. Daily digests create temporal continuity and narrative thread. Strong coupling between forward planning (Today's Plan), retrospection (Yesterday's Summary), task tracking, and insight extraction (Key Learnings). Well-established habit with 10-20√ó frequency on core concepts.
useWhen: Daily planning or task organization questions
summaries.interpretation: Strong meta-cognitive discipline - 11.4% dedicated to 'thinking about thinking' shows mature second brain practice

summaries.name: Strategic Context & Versioning
summaries.summary: Strategic navigation layer - 'where am I on the map' consciousness. Tracks version transitions (v1.1 ‚Üí v1.2), roadmap clarity (3 pillars, completion vision, schedule), infrastructure hygiene (secrets management, git exclusions), and gap awareness (backlog, next actions). Reference nodes consulted periodically for orientation rather than active work. Low frequency (26 total) but high conceptual importance as 'North Star' concepts.
coreConcepts: Cortex OS v1.2 Roadmap (2√ó) - future direction
useWhen: Big picture 'where are we headed' queries
summaries.interpretation: Reference checkpoints for orientation - uniform 2√ó frequency suggests template-based navigation nodes

summaries.name: Architecture Decision Records
summaries.summary: Architectural memory system - structured records of 'why we built it this way'. Standardized ADR template (all concepts appear exactly 6√ó): Context ‚Üí Decision ‚Üí Rationale ‚Üí Alternatives ‚Üí Consequences ‚Üí Follow-ups. Forms interconnected decision network (Èñ¢ÈÄ£ADR links). Enterprise-grade discipline for solo development - optimizing for long-term maintainability and preventing 'why did I do this?' amnesia.
useWhen: Understanding why specific architectural choices were made
Planning follow-up actions on past decisions
summaries.interpretation: Institutional memory for solo development - decisions reference and build on previous decisions

summaries.name: Achievements & Momentum
summaries.summary: Motivation and narrative layer - 'what I've accomplished' tracker. Structured weekly template: Overview ‚Üí Highlights ‚Üí Challenges ‚Üí Reflection ‚Üí Next Week Focus. Creates narrative continuity and concrete evidence of progress. Smallest cluster but critical for psychological sustainability - defense against 'I'm not making progress' feeling. Combines celebration (highlights), honesty (challenges), and forward pull (next week focus).
summaries.interpretation: Psychological sustainability mechanism - maintains momentum and prevents burnout through structured celebration

cognitiveProfile.interpretation: Deep technical specialist with strong operational discipline, long-term thinking, and high self-awareness
